en.presentation-text:
I'm Uriel, an engineer passionate about technology who has found programming to be an enjoyable way to innovate, optimize, and make processes more efficient.
With a solid background in Mechatronics Engineering and Computer Systems, I have developed a broad range of technical skills, from industrial automation to web development.

My experience in the airport sector has provided me with a strong foundation in problem-solving and teamwork. Currently, I am focused on honing my web development skills, with a particular interest in ASP.NET, C# and SQL.

I'm excited to apply my knowledge to challenging projects and collaborate with innovative teams.
If you're looking for a developer with a curious mind and a great capacity to learn, don't hesitate to contact me!
